member.name: T:System.Web.Mvc.ControllerExtensions
member.summary: Various extension methods for the ASP.NET MVC class.

member.name: M:System.Web.Mvc.ControllerExtensions.NotifyAsync(System.Web.Mvc.Controller,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Submits a notification to all matching registered WebHooks. To match, the must be registered by the current and have a filter that matches one or more of the actions provided for the notification.
member.param: Optional additional data to include in the WebHook request.
member.returns: The number of instances that were selected and subsequently notified about the actions.

member.name: M:System.Web.Mvc.ControllerExtensions.NotifyAsync(System.Web.Mvc.Controller,System.String,System.Object,System.Func{Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.WebHook,System.String,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Submits a notification to all matching registered WebHooks. To match, the must be registered by the current and have a filter that matches one or more of the actions provided for the notification.
member.param: Optional additional data to include in the WebHook request.
A function to test each to see whether it fulfills the condition. The predicate is passed the and the user who registered it. If the predicate returns true then the is included; otherwise it is not.
member.returns: The number of instances that were selected and subsequently notified about the actions.

member.name: M:System.Web.Mvc.ControllerExtensions.NotifyAsync(System.Web.Mvc.Controller,Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.NotificationDictionary[])
member.summary: Submits a notification to all matching registered WebHooks. To match, the must be registered by the current and have a filter that matches one or more of the actions provided for the notification.
member.param: The set of notifications to include in the WebHook.
member.returns: The number of instances that were selected and subsequently notified about the actions.

member.name: M:System.Web.Mvc.ControllerExtensions.NotifyAllAsync(System.Web.Mvc.Controller,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Submits a notification to all matching registered WebHooks across all users. To match, the must have a filter that matches one or more of the actions provided for the notification.

member.returns: The number of instances that were selected and subsequently notified about the actions.

member.name: T:System.Web.Mvc.DependencyResolverExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for facilitating getting the services used by custom WebHooks.

member.name: M:System.Web.Mvc.DependencyResolverExtensions.GetLogger(System.Web.Mvc.IDependencyResolver)
member.summary: Gets an implementation registered with the Dependency Injection engine or a default implementation if none are registered.
member.returns: The registered instance or a default implementation if none are registered.

member.name: M:System.Web.Mvc.DependencyResolverExtensions.GetSettings(System.Web.Mvc.IDependencyResolver)
member.summary: Gets a instance registered with the Dependency Injection engine or a default implementation based on application settings if none are registered.
member.returns: The registered instance or a default implementation if none are registered.

member.name: M:System.Web.Mvc.DependencyResolverExtensions.GetFilterProviders(System.Web.Mvc.IDependencyResolver)
member.summary: Gets the set of instances registered with the Dependency Injection engine or an empty collection if none are registered.
